element.name: Loop (Mux Channel)
element.description: Causes all child experiments to be run across a user specified range of multiplexer channels

category.name: Hardware
category.description: Select or control aspects of the hardware

element.name: Manual Potentiostat Select
element.description: Allows the user to manually select a potentiostat to use in the sequence

element.name: Multiple Instrument Select
element.description: Allows the user to select multiple potentiostats to use in the sequence

element.name: Cell State Mode
element.description: Specify whether the cell is left on or not between sequence steps

element.name: Manual Multiplexer Select
element.description: Allows the user to manually select a multiplexer to use in the sequence

element.name: Multiplexer Channel Select
element.description: Specify the channel number of the multiplexer

element.name: Loop (Mux Channel)
element.description: Causes all child experiments to be run across a user specified range of multiplexer channels

element.name: EIS Box Channel Select
element.description: Specify the channel number of the EIS Box

element.name: Loop (EIS Box Channel)
element.description: Causes all child experiments to be run across a user specified range of EIS Box channels

element.name: Manual TDC Select
element.description: Allows the user to manually select a TDC to use in the sequence

element.name: TDC Temperature Set
element.description: Specify the set point temperature on the TDC

element.name: Set Digital Out
element.description: Set one or more digital outs of the potentiostat

element.name: Wait for Digital In
element.description: Wait for one or more digital in's of the potentiostat

element.name: Collect Optical Spectrum
element.description: Collect a Raw Optical Spectrum

element.name: Loop (Cycle)
element.description: Causes all child experiments to be looped a user specified number of times

element.name: Loop (Time)
element.description: Causes all child experiments to be looped a user specified amount of time

element.name: Loop (Variable)
element.description: Causes all child experiments to be looped a until a variable meets some criteria

element.name: Define Variable
element.description: Allows the user to create a variable that can be used as a setup or looping parameter.

element.name: Modify Variable
element.description: Allows the user to modify a variable that has already been created.

element.name: Modify Variable Prompted
element.description: Allows the user to modify a variable that has already been created.

element.name: Delay
element.description: Causes the sequence to wait a user specified period of time before continuing on to the next operation

element.name: Group Data Files
element.description: Allows data files generated by the sequencer to be grouped together

element.name: Multiple Instrument Start
element.description: Allows the sequence to be started on multiple instruments at the same time

element.name: User Prompt
element.description: Display a user prompt and wait for OK to be pressed.

element.name: Specify Electrode Type
element.description: Allows specification of the electrode type

element.name: Stir-Purge Cell
element.description: Set the stir and purge option

element.name: Set Rotation Speed
element.description: Specify the rotation speed and type for a rotating electrode

element.name: Open Circuit Potential
element.description: Performs an Open Circuit Potential measurement

element.name: Conditioning
element.description: Performs a Conditioning Step

element.name: Get Ru
element.description: Performs Ru Estimation

element.name: Galvanodynamic
element.description: Performs a galvanodynamic scan of the working electrode

element.name: Potentiodynamic
element.description: Performs a potentiodynamic scan of the working electrode

element.name: Potentiostatic
element.description: Performs a potentiostatic hold of the working electrode

element.name: Galvanostatic
element.description: Performs a galvanostatic hold of the working electrode

element.name: Cyclic Polarization
element.description: Performs a cyclic polarization of the working electrode

element.name: Galvanic Corrosion
element.description: Performs a galvanic corrosion experiment between the working and reference electrodes

element.name: Polarization Resistance
element.description: Performs a polarization scan of the working electrode

element.name: Electrochemical Frequency Modulation
element.description: Performs an EFM experiment on the working electrode

element.name: Potentiostatic EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance scan under potentiostatic control

element.name: Galvanostatic EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance scan galvanostatic control

element.name: Hybrid EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance scan under galvanostatic control with an AC Voltage input

element.name: Mott Schottky
element.description: Performs a single frequency impedance measurement at various DC Voltages

element.name: Single Frequency EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance measurement versus time at a single frequency

element.name: OptiEisPstat
element.description: Performs an OptiEisPstat Measurement

element.name: OptiEisGstat
element.description: Performs an OptiEisGstat Measurement

element.name: CombiEisPstat
element.description: Performs a Combined OptiEIS and Single-sine Measurement under potentiostatic control

element.name: CombiEisGstat
element.description: Performs a Combined OptiEIS and Single-sine Measurement under potentiostatic control

element.name: ZRA Mode Electrochemical Noise
element.description: Performs an electrochemical noise measurement using ZRA mode

element.name: Expected Max V
element.description: Check if High Voltage Electrometer can be used

element.name: Chronoamperometry
element.description: Performs a chronoamperometry measurement under potentiostatic control

element.name: Chronocoulometry
element.description: Performs a chronocoulometry measurement under potentiostatic control

element.name: Chronopotentiometry
element.description: Performs a chronopotentiometry scan under galvanostatic control

element.name: Cyclic Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a cyclic voltammetry scan

element.name: Linear Sweep Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a linear sweep voltammetry scan

element.name: Repeating Chronoamperometry
element.description: Performs a repeating chronoamperometry measurement under potentiostatic control

element.name: Repeating Chronopotentiometry
element.description: Performs a repeating chronopotentiometry scan under galvanostatic control

element.name: Sampled DC Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a Sampled DC Voltammetry experiment

element.name: Differential Pulse Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a Differential Pulse Voltammetry experiment

element.name: Square Wave Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a Square Wave Voltammetry experiment

element.name: Normal Pulse Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a Normal Pulse Voltammetry experiment

element.name: Reverse Normal Pulse Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a Reverse Normal Pulse Voltammetry experiment

element.name: PWR Cell Config
element.description: Cell Configuration for all Sequence steps

element.name: PWR Read Voltage
element.description: Performs a read voltage experiment

element.name: PWR Potentiostatic
element.description: Performs a power style potentiostatic experiment

element.name: PWR Galvanostatic
element.description: Performs a power style galvanostatic experiment

element.name: Charge
element.description: Performs a constant current charge experiment

element.name: Discharge
element.description: Performs a discharge experiment

element.name: Loop (Cyclic Charge Discharge)
element.description: Loop used to create a capacity curve from Cyclic Charge Discharge

element.name: Constant Current Polarization Curve
element.description: Performs a constant current polarization experiment

element.name: Constant Resistance Polarization Curve
element.description: Performs a constant resistance polarization experiment

element.name: Constant Power Polarization Curve
element.description: Performs a constant power polarization experiment

element.name: PWR Cyclic Voltammetry
element.description: Performs a cyclic voltammetry scan

element.name: PWR Galvanostatic EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance scan galvanostatic control

element.name: PWR Hybrid EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance scan under galvanostatic control with an AC Voltage input

element.name: PWR Potentiostatic EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance scan under potentiostatic control

element.name: PWR Galvanostatic Single Frequency EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance measurement at a constant frequency under galvanostatic control

element.name: PWR Hybrid Single Frequency EIS
element.description: Performs an impedance measurement at a constant frequency under hybrid control

element.name: PWR Self Discharge
element.description: Performs a Self Discharge experiment

element.name: Galvanostatic Intermittent Titration Technique
element.description: Step used to perform a Galvanostatic Intermittent Titration Experiment

element.name: Potentiostatic Intermittent Titration Technique
element.description: Step used to perform a Potentiostatic Intermittent Titration Experiment

element.name: Discharge Profile
element.description: Performs a discharge experiment from a file profile

element.name: AE Channels
element.description: Specifies the Aux Electrometer channels to use

element.name: AE Limits
element.description: Specifies the Aux Electrometer stop test limits
